data.short_description: Toggling a role option off and on multiple times will occasionally make the save button disappear
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage roles - Toggle a role to be mentionable/unmentionable - Observe the save button for a few seconds and save the change if nothing happens - Toggle the role to be mentionable/unmentionable again - Observe the save button again for a few seconds, and save the change if nothing happens - Repeat these steps, observing the save button for a few seconds before saving
